info.name: FormVox
info.summary: File-based forms and polls for Nextcloud
info.description:
FormVox is a Nextcloud app for creating and managing forms and polls.
**Key Features:** - 100% file-based - no database tables - All data stored in .fvform files - Native Nextcloud sharing - Conditional logic (branching) - Multiple question types - Quiz mode with scoring - Export to CSV, JSON, Excel
**Question Types:** - Text and textarea - Single and multiple choice - Dropdown, date, time - Number, scale, rating - File upload, matrix
**Unique Benefits:** - One file contains everything (definition + responses) - Works with Nextcloud's versioning - End-to-end encryption compatible - No database migrations needed
info.author: FormVox
